message: The first few chapters of the theory book had me believing that SW was some kind of pure and perfect archetype. But then I realized that Test -- the Crucial Element of the story -- is not one of the eight elements that make up a Protagonist. It belongs to the Emotion archetype. So does this mean that Luke is a complex character and thus ruins the "purity" of the story?

I think theoretically yes - though there has been work on Archetypal Characters in the different sections (Archetypal Characters based on Methodology, Evaluations and Purposes - the ones in the book are based on Motivations) - google search "lost theory book site:storymind.com" and you should find more info on that
There was a discussion of this very issue in the Dramatica Forum: http://forums.screenplay.com/viewtopic.php?f=21&t=3757&hilit=+luke
